text: 9:7 Godɨn Araziba 15:7; Aghuzir Akaba 11:25; Rom 12:8Kamagh amizɨ, ia bar vaghvagh deravɨra faragh nɨghnigh, egh bizir ia anɨngasa ifongezim faragha a gɨfogh. Gumazitam o amizitam uan bizitam anɨngsɨ osemegh suam, me bizibara anɨngasa puvɨram e gaghora e abɨri. Gumazamizir bar akuegha uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua biziba anɨdiba, God bar me gifonge.
